headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUBOFSKY, ROBERT L

lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert L. We mourn the loss of our dear friend Bob, admired by all for his loyalty, generosity and kindness. Our deepest, heartfelt sympathy and love to Betsy, Ned, Lindsay, Nancy, Stephen, Matthew, Michael, Casey and Charlie. Joanne and Michael
